title: King David
creator_credit: Paramount Pictures, Martin Elfand, Bruce Beresford and Ken Adam
brief_description: Traces the life of the lowly shepherd boy who ascended to the throne of ancient Israel from his childhood battle with Goliath to his self-destructive passion for Bathsheba. Stars Richard Gere.
creator_credit_for_label: Paramount Pictures, Martin Elfand, Bruce Beresford and Ken Adam
description: Traces the life of the lowly shepherd boy who ascended to the throne of ancient Israel from his childhood battle with Goliath to his self-destructive passion for Bathsheba. Stars Richard Gere.
